Getting MOO!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Hoaxes, Myths and Pranks!: Getting MOO!
By burags on Monday, August 14, 2000 - 11:44 pm:

I have just heard of a cheat of getting a Moo on MR2.It says use a Phoenix let it lose 2 battles and feed it 2 smoke snakes.I don't know the exact way and i have never done it. Can somebody enligthen me.

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, August 15, 2000 - 12:27 am:

You can only get Moo from CD or by using a Gameshark. The "method" you describe is a prank, and whoever is purposefully keeping this "info" posted on the web is doing everyone a disservice.
